title: HOUR 2 – Impressive Stafford
itunes:title: HOUR 2 – Impressive Stafford
description:
Colin talks about Matthew Stafford’s quick ascent to NFL history, is joined by 3 time Super Bowl champ and NFL analyst Mark Schlereth, and why the Lakers aren’t very good.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
